DS1307:
makecode DS1307 RTC Package.
From microbit/micropython Chinese community.
http://www.micropython.org.cn

DS1307 block
DS1307.DateTime|param|day: is the Day will be set, eg: 15
DS1307.DateTime|param|hour: is the Hour will be set, eg: 0
DS1307.DateTime|param|minute: is the Minute will be set, eg: 0
DS1307.DateTime|param|month: is the Month will be set, eg: 2
DS1307.DateTime|param|second: is the Second will be set, eg: 0
DS1307.DateTime|param|weekday: is the Weekday will be set, eg: 4
DS1307.DateTime|param|year: is the Year will be set, eg: 2018
